EmailTemplate.name: McDannel: Reaching Out.
EmailTemplate.subject: Reaching Out
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Hi there! I just called and left you a message, sorry I missed you! I just wanted to follow up with an email and make sure you have all my contact information. Can you give me a call at your earliest convenience?
Talk to you soon!
Sarah McDannel VinPro Dealer Advocate O: 800-980-7488 x 45807 C: 913-827-7850
We are always striving to improve our product and customer service. To reach this goal of excellence, we would love to hear from you! Please submit feedback of your experience, positive or negative, at VinCares@vinsolutions.com.
